channel.title: Accueil on Les Rendez-vous des Speakers

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: 1. Purpose A primary goal of La Rentrée des Speakers is to be inclusive to the largest number of contributors, with the most varied and diverse backgrounds possible. As such, we are committed to providing a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ability, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, and religion (or lack thereof). La Rentrée des Speakers prides itself on being an open, respectful, and inclusive community.
